activities.title: Arrive & Settle In
activities.description: Unpack, explore the space, claim your meditation spots

activities.title: Opening Ceremony
activities.description: Light a candle, set intentions together, read retreat mission aloud

activities.title: Nature Walk
activities.description: Explore the property, ground yourselves in nature

activities.title: Cook Dinner Together
activities.description: Lemon Herb Salmon - collaborate in the kitchen

activities.title: Morning Ritual
activities.description: Gratitude journaling, intentions for the day

activities.title: Brainstorming Session 1: Vision Alignment
activities.description: 90-120 min - What does our ideal life look like?

activities.title: Strengths & Complementarity Exercise
activities.description: Visual mapping of how you complement each other

activities.title: Decision-Making Session
activities.description: SWOT Analysis + Value Proposition Canvas for top 3 ideas

activities.title: Action Planning Session
activities.description: If idea is chosen, create Trello board structure

activities.title: Letter to Future Self
activities.description: Write letters to open in 6 months

activities.title: Wind Down / Slothing
activities.description: Final evening together at the retreat

recipes.name: Lemon Herb Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini)
instructions: Place salmon and vegetables on baking sheet
Drizzle with olive oil, squeeze lemon juice over salmon
Season with herbs, salt, pepper, garlic
Bake for 20-25 minutes until salmon flakes easily

recipes.name: Mediterranean Chicken Pasta
ingredients: 8 oz whole wheat pasta (penne or rigatoni)
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions, reserve 1/2 cup pasta water
In large pan, heat olive oil and cook chicken with Italian seasoning until golden
Add garlic and tomatoes, cook until tomatoes soften (5-7 min)
Add spinach and olives, cook until spinach wilts
Toss in cooked pasta with a splash of pasta water
Top with feta cheese, fresh basil, and squeeze of lemon juice

recipes.name: Thai-Inspired Coconut Curry with Chicken
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, snap peas, carrots)
1 cup brown rice or cauliflower rice
instructions: Sauté chicken in large pan until cooked through
Add curry paste, stir for 1 minute
Serve over rice, garnish with basil and lime

snacks.name: Blueberries
snacks.benefits: High in antioxidants, improve memory and cognitive function, reduce mental fatigue

snacks.name: Dark Chocolate (70%+ cacao)
snacks.benefits: Enhances focus, mood booster, contains flavonoids that improve brain function

snacks.name: Walnuts
snacks.benefits: Rich in omega-3s, support brain health, improve creative thinking

snacks.name: Hummus with Vegetables
snacks.benefits: Protein stabilizes blood sugar, vegetables provide vitamins, sustained energy

snacks.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey
snacks.benefits: Protein for sustained energy, probiotics support gut-brain connection

snacks.name: Green Tea
snacks.benefits: L-theanine promotes calm focus, mild caffeine for alertness without jitters

snacks.name: Almonds
snacks.benefits: Vitamin E protects cognitive function, healthy fats support brain health

snacks.name: Avocado Toast (whole grain)
snacks.benefits: Healthy fats improve blood flow to brain, complex carbs provide steady energy

general: What is my biggest limiting belief right now?
What is the one thing I must stop doing to achieve our Master Desire?
How can our partnership create something greater than the sum of its parts?
If money were no object, how would I spend my days?
What does 'success' mean to me personally?
What am I naturally curious about that could become a business?
What problems do I see in the world that I'm passionate about solving?
What would I do if I knew I couldn't fail?
How can I use my unique strengths to serve others?
What legacy do we want to create together?
couples: What does our 'dream life' look like in 5 years? Describe a perfect day.
What are you most afraid of when it comes to starting a business?
How do you want to feel on a daily basis once we've achieved our goals?
What limiting belief from your childhood might be holding you back?
When do you feel most alive and energized?
What do you need from me to feel supported in this journey?
How can we ensure our business serves our relationship, not the other way around?
What are you willing to sacrifice? What are you NOT willing to sacrifice?
What does 'enough' look like for you financially?
How do my strengths inspire you? How do yours inspire me?
What's one thing you've always wanted to try but haven't yet?
How can we stay connected when life gets busy?
What role does money play in your definition of success?
What are you most excited about in building something together?
If we could only pursue one business idea, what would be most meaningful?
How do we handle disagreements about business direction?
What does work-life balance mean to you?
What are your non-negotiables in how we run a business?
How can we build something that allows us to grow individually while growing together?
What would make you feel proud of what we create?
